data.title: Hop (1995
data.text:
history l discography l events l itunes l magazine l contact l home

BOMB HIP-HOP DISCOGRAPHY (1995 - 2009)

BOMB FLEXIDISC

flexidisc plastic record

Released July 1992 (only 500 units manufactured - out of print)

Catalog # : Harlock 0792

Features two songs, one by Rymskeme and one by Charizma & Peanut Butter Wolf. This Flexidisc plastic record was found inserted in The Bomb Hip-Hop Magazine.

Track Listing

1. Jack the Mack - Charizma & Peanut Butter Wolf

2. Da Word - Rymskeme

3. Message From the Editor

___________________________________________________________

BOMB FLEXIDISC II

Released October 1992 (only 500 units manufactured - out of print)

flexidisc plastic record

Catalog # : Harlock 1092

Features tracks by The Goats (Ruffhouse), Rufus & Rifi, Behemoth (produced by Dan the Automator), Down 2 Earth and a special Dan the Automator beat. This Flexidisc plastic record was also found inserted in The Bomb Hip-Hop Magazine.

Track Listing

SIDE A

1. Typical American - The Goats

2. Rufus and Rifi - Louder than God

SIDE B

1. Suckers Never Play Me - Behemoth

2. She Doesn't Do Her Hair Anymore - Down 2 Earth

3. Name Dat Toon - Automator

___________________________________________________________

BOMB HIP HOP COMPILATION - Various Artists

Released in 1994 (out of print)

Vinyl, Compact Disc and Cassette

Catalog # : PGA 8888

Features songs by Blackalicious, Charizma & Peanut Butter Wolf, Madchild featuring DJ Q-Bert, Homeliss Derelix, Mystik Journeymen, Bored Stiff and more!

click here for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

RETURN OF THE DJ -VOLUME I - The Bomb D.J.'s

Released July 1995 / re-released July 1997 with new album artwork

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc (no longer available)

Catalog # : BHH2002

This project was the first all dj/all scratching (turntablist) album ever released. These twelve tracks by world renown DJs helped pave the way for the return of the hip-hop disc jockey. Features Invisbl Skratch Piklz, Rob Swift (X-Men), Beat Junkies, Peanut Butter Wolf, Mixmaster Mike, Kool DJ E.Q., and more!

click here for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

RETURN OF THE DJ -VOLUME II - The Bomb D.J.'s

Released April 1997

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2003

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

This follow-up album features sixteen dj tracks produced by DJs from all over the world. Features Mr. Dibbs, Z-Trip, Radar, Kid Koala, Ruthless, Roc Raida (X-Men), Kool DJ E.Q. and more. Voted by Spin Magazine as the #14 in the Top 20 albums of 1997!

click here for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

BOMB BEATS - S.T.S./Mr. Dibbs

Released July 1997 (out of print) SOLD OUT

Vinyl EP

Catalog # : BHH2005

This record features 10 breakbeats by two producers; Mr. Dibbs from 1200 Hobos/Atmosphere fame is featured on one side of the record and S.T.S. from Scotland on the other side.

Released on BOMB UNLIMITED (a subsidiary of Bomb Hip-Hop Records)

click here for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

BOMB WORLDWIDE - Various Artists

Released October 1997

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2004

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

An international rap compilation featuring MCs from the U.K., Germany, Australia, Japan, Canada and the USA. Features songs by Swollen Members, Defari, J-Live, Dilated Peoples, Funky DL, Hijack and many more.

click here for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

RHYMEBOMB - Blade

Released October 1997

Vinyl 12" single

Catalog # : BHH2006

CLICK HERE to purchase the Vinyl

U.K. rap legend Blade (of Blade and Mark B. fame) with three songs on twelve inch vinyl. Includes bonus instrumentals and acappellas for "Rhyme Bomb" and "Born To Rule" Also includes the underground hit "The Way It Has to Be".

click here to read Blade's Bio

click here to read a Blade Interview

___________________________________________________________

KICK UP DUST - Krispy

Released December 1997

Vinyl 12" single

Catalog # : BB2013

CLICK HERE to purchase the Vinyl

Bomb's sister label Bomb Basic released this Krispy 12" featuring One Drop guest appearing on the song "Kick Up Dust". Both songs feature Remix Radio Edits, L.P. Versions and Remix Instrumentals.

___________________________________________________________

POSSESSION - Metabass 'n' Breath

Released December 1997 (out of print) SOLD OUT

Vinyl 12" single

Catalog # : BB2011

Five song 12" single by Australia's Metabass 'n' Breath featuring tracks from their CD full length Seek. Contains "Possession "(vocal & instrumental), "Meta Medicine", "My Form Is Water" (vocal & instrumental), "Where's My Guitar part two" and "Ramble On".

___________________________________________________________

SEEK - Metabass 'n' Breath

Released January 1998 (out of print) SOLD OUT

Compact Disc

Catalog # : BB2012

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

Full length album featuring Metabass 'n' Breath's full hip-hop band! Metabass are Baba, Elf Tranzporter, Morganics, Neicha, Sloth and Brother Love.

___________________________________________________________

360 - Cipher

Released Febuary 1998 (out of print)

Vinyl & Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2008

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

Vancouver-based Cipher debuted on Bomb with an album containing a total of 16 tracks. Features guest appearances by Sleep, Natural Skills, Pele Stoane, Precise and XL.

click here to read Cipher's Bio and for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

MAN OR MYTH? - DJ Faust

Released May 1998

Double Vinyl, Compact Disc and Cassette

Catalog # : BHH2007

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

This 60 minute musical collage features the phenomenal turntable skills of DJ Faust. The scratching, beats and echoes are performed by hand! This was the first ever full length album released by a turntablist artist. Features guest appearances by 3xDMC Champion DJ Craze, Shotgun (former Goodie Mob dj) and female dj Shortee.

click here to read DJ Faust's Bio and for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

ANCIENT TERMITES - PhonosycographDISK (DJ Disk)

Released September 1998

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc (no longer available)

Catalog # : BHH2009

Turntablist DJ Disk (of Invisibl Skratch Piklz/Shigger Fragger fame) with his first full length album featuring 13 songs. Disk showcases his incredible scratching skills over alternative hip-hop music including guest appearances by guitarist Buckethead (Guns N Roses) and drummer Brain (Primus). DJ Disk has toured as Herbie Hancock's dj.

click here to read DJ Disk's Bio and for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

FATHOMLESS - DJ Faust, Shortee Craze

Released September 1998 (out of print)

Vinyl EP

Catalog # : BHH2016

This limited edition vinyl only release features two pieces from the Man of Myth album ("Mind Over Matter" & "Broken Joints"), as well as five incredible new recorded pieces "Conundrum", "Farrago", "My Turn", "What It Means", and "Ironic, Isn't It". Features 3 time DMC Champion DJ Craze and Shortee. A rare limited promo only CD run of 500 copies also exist.

click here to read the Press Release and for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

SAVIOR / WALK WITH A BOP - Baby J with POETIC & A-ALIKES

Released October 1998

Vinyl 12" single

Catalog # : BHH2017

CLICK HERE to purchase the Vinyl

12" single from the Baby J producer album "Birth". Features the song "Savior" (radio, intrumental and acappella) by Poetic (from the Gravediggaz - r.i.p.) on one side and the New York rap duo A-ALIKES (Dead Prez affiliates) with "Walk With A Bop" (album, radio, instrumental and acappella) on the other side of the record.

click here watch the Music Videos of both SAVIOR and WALK WITH A BOP

___________________________________________________________

THE HULK - Profound

Released October 1998

Vinyl 12" single

Catalog # : BHH2018

CLICK HERE to purchase the Vinyl

Three song single by Dallas rapper Profound featuring "The Hulk"(radio edit, gamma beats and instrumental), "Warriors Song"(remix and radio remix) and "See Y'all" (vocal, instrumental and acappella). Produced by Skin and Rube of Hydroponic Sound System.

___________________________________________________________

CROSS THE BORDER / MICROPHONE D.O.N. - Krispy

Released November 1998

Vinyl 12" single

Catalog # : BHH2019

CLICK HERE to purchase the Vinyl

Krispy exploded in the winter of '98 with two songs from their album "From the Country". This slammin' single features two completely different mixes of "Cross the Border" and a radio, album and instrumental of "Microphone D.O.N.".

___________________________________________________________

BONES BEATS VOLUME 1 - Stix Bones

Released November 1998 (out of print)

Vinyl EP

Catalog # : BHH2020

Live drums breakbeat record by New York drummer Stix Bones. Features 10 slammin' breakbeats (each with 4 patterns for a total of 40) as well as a special bonus track with John Weatherley on horns. A perfect record for producers, beatjugglers and radio dj's.

click here for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

BIRTH - Baby J

Released November 1998

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2021

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

UK hip-hop producer Baby J debuted his first LP with Bomb featuring mostly New York MC's including Shabazz the Disciple, Poetic (from the Gravediggaz - r.i.p.), A-Alikes, Bless, Freestyle (Arsonists), Shaqueen and many more.

click here to read the Bio and for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

TECHNICS CHAINSAW MASSACRE - Jeep Beat Collective

Released January 1999

Triple Vinyl & Double Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2025

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

This was the US debut album for the turntablist crew Jeep Beat Collective. Features tracks from their UK album "Attack of the Wildstyle Beatfreaks" as well as remixes from 12" singles and tracks from their album "For Jimi Hendrix". An essential anthology! The album reached #1 on CMJ's RPM Chart.

click here to read the Bio and for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

FROM THE COUNTRY - Krispy

Released April 1999

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2023

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

One of the UK's most long lived hip-hop crews... since 1987. After contributing the joint "Raised In Rhythm" to the 1997 Bomb compilation "Bomb Worldwide" the UK rap duo Krispy were signed for a full length album. This US full length release prompted widescale acclaim from both US and European press alike, featuring impressive cameos from Rootz Manuva and Huntkillbury Finn.

click here to read the Bio and for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

FOREIGN LANDS - Kreators

Released June 1999

Vinyl 12" single

Catalog # : BHH2026

CLICK HERE to purchase the Vinyl

Features 3 songs. LP and Radio versions of "Foreign Lands" and the LP version of "Spotlight" on The A-Side. The B-Side features LP, Radio and Instrumental versions of "Who to Trust".

click here to watch the Music Video for the song Foreign Lands

___________________________________________________________

ENGLISH LESSON - DJ Format

Released June 1999

Vinyl 12" single

Catalog # : BHH2028

CLICK HERE to purchase the Vinyl

This was the only single taken from the album Revenge of the B-Boy, the original motion picture soundtrack to I SAW YOUR MAMA BREAKDANCING BUCKNAKED. DJ Format (from the UK) blends hip-hop and breakbeat to create five refreshing and creative tunes on this piece of wax. "English Lesson" and "Extra Lesson" are the perfect anthems to get b-boys & b-girls out on the dance floor. The flip side of this record features a remix of Vinyl Overdose from Return of the DJ - Volume II called "Vinyl Vasectomy". DJ Format cuts & scratches a fury of beats & vocal bits to rework this classic song into a turntablist masterpiece. An instrumental is also included for those who just want to enjoy the beats or for DJs to add their own cuts to the track.

___________________________________________________________

CRAZEE MUSICK - Craze

Released June 1999

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2031

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

Craze is continuously traveling the world performing in the U.S., Europe, Australia, Japan and various other countries. Craze is the 3-time dj champion of DMC! He has been featured on DJ Faust's "Man or Myth" album, the "Fathomless" EP (with DJ's Faust and Shortee) and was featured in Time Magazine! "Crazee Musick ", his debut album, was a hit with his intricate style of hip-hop, jungle, drum n bass and abstract music.

click here for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

REVENGE OF THE B-BOY - Various Artists

Released July 1999

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2034

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

Revenge of the B-Boy is the original motion picture soundtrack to the independent film I SAW YOUR MAMA BREAKDANCING BUCKNAKED. This CD & Double Vinyl release features custom made b-boy anthems from producers and DJs from the UK, Europe, Australia and the USA. Musical styles include hip-hop, turntablism, electro, big beat and breaks. Episode 2 also available.

click here for more information and the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

NO CONTEST - Kreators

Released August 1999

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2030

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

These four MC's; G Squared, Jayson, XL and Big Juan dropped their debut album "NO CONTEST" that featured songs touching on a variety of subjects."Spotlight" and "No Ordinary Love", guest featuring rapper ED O G (best known for his solo hits "I Got to Have It" and "Be A Father to Your Child"). The socially conscious and radio-friendly "If You Don't Know" and the thought provoking "Chemical" shows a side of the Kreators that is interested in building awareness of the issues that plague relationships and young adults on a whole. "Big Plans" was a crossover summer hit. Other tracks, like "Truth vs. Game" and "Who To Trust" served to round out the album by delivering a strong message to individuals who are blindly entering the business or who are getting exploited by the companies that represent and promote them.

click here to read the Bio and for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

CONTENTS UNDER PRESSURE - Various Artists

Released August 1999

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2024

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

Assembling some of the best producers and turntablists (scratch DJs) from around the world this compilation featured some of the most exciting instrumental hip-hop available from the UK, Europe, and the USA.

click here for Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

WHO'S YOUR DADDY - DJ T-Rock

Released August 1999

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2035

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

T-Rock's full length LP "Who's Your Daddy" on Bomb records proved that the turntablist movement was here to stay. As a part of the internationally known Citizenz crew (DJ Faust, Craze and Shortee) T-Rock has been an Atlanta favorite for years (now living in Los Angeles). Since 1988, hip-hop's golden era, T-Rock has built his foundation of turntable skills from the ground up. His efforts have resulted this debut album filled with super DJ tricks as well as more structured song stylings. Incorporating scratches with fat bass lines, smacking snares and funk organs this album enthralled the most die hard hip-hop head as well as the average urban music listener.

click here for more info and the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

INWARD JOURNEYS - DJ Faust

Released September 1999

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2037

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD

Meticulously assembled track by track, Faust blended banging rare beats, bouncing basslines and syncopated scratch solos to take listeners beyond the boundaries of current turntable based music on this release. This album tells the story of Faust himself, pioneering scholar and magician who sells his soul for immortality and infinite knowledge. However, DJ Faust continues the tale, resurrecting Faust and traveling through 4 planes; fire, wind, water and earth. Making a special guest appearance on the album is DJ Shortee, one of the very few female turntablists/producers and other half of the dynamic duo (Faust & Shortee). A healthy dose of neck snapping drum tracks, supersonic cuts, annihilating bass and soul create another groundbreaking journey.

click here for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

THE DREAMER - Shortee

Released September 1999

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2042

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

Shortee's debut solo release "The Dreamer" was the first ever female turntablist/DJ/producer full length album, making it a first of it's kind! Listen to this album and you're guaranteed to hear an assortment of funky beats with fat bass kicks, jazzy bass lines, pianos, trumpets, flutes, soulful scratches, tons of percussion and so much more. Shortee used her music to guide the listener through the story of her dreams as she conducts a sleep research experiment. In the story, the dreamer's brain waves emit sound waves as she dreams. The album represents a recording of this experiment. Each song symbolizes a dream and each dream is different - ranging in hip-hop, dub, drum n' bass, go-go and swing.

click here for the track listing

___________________________________________________________

DEFINITION OF NICE - DJ Paul Nice with AG / Babu / Gennessee

Released October 1999

Vinyl 12" single

Catalog # : BHH2038

CLICK HERE to purchase the Vinyl

"Definition of Nice" featuring AG (Show and AG, DITC), Gennessee, and scratching by world famous Beat Junkie dj Babu is pure hip-hop at it's finest. B-Side features a remix titled "Re-definition of Nice". Both sides of the record feature Dirty, Radio and Bonus Beats versions. Paul Nice has done production for Masta Ace (Don't Understand featuring Greg Nice), Biz Markie (Turn the Party Out on Groove Attack), Guru (Gang Starr), Swollen Members, Grand Agent, Rasco and Foreign Legion among others.

___________________________________________________________

RETURN OF THE DJ - VOLUME III - The Bomb D.J.'s

Released October 1999

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc (no longer available)

Catalog # : BHH2040

The third installment in the groundbreaking series. Album features Mr. Dibbs, DJ Faust, Z-Trip, DJ Design, Eddie Def & Extrakd, Furious, Shortee and many more.

click here for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

THE LIFE AND TIMES OF A BEATBOXER - Metabass 'n' Breath

Released February 2000

Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2036

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD

The fifth element of Hip-Hop, the lost art of beatboxing has been found and is regaining its rightful place as a musical form. This album features the beatboxing theatrics of Metabass 'n' Breath, a live hip hop band from Sydney, Australia (with members from NY, LA, Austria, and Sydney). This beatbox album is like no other. It is a diverse journey that pricked up the ears of hip-hop heads, electronica, tribal and avant garde explorers. The album is a journey, telling the story of a beatboxer and his adventures and challenges. Along the way some great guests join in. Fellow Bomb allies DJ Faust, Shortee, and the Fifth Platoon's Vin Roc.

click here for the Track Listing

click here to watch the Music Video for the song PERFECTION

___________________________________________________________

DROPPEN THE BOMB - Various Artists

Released May 2001

Double Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2022

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD

A special CD only release that features a bonus disc featuring the first ever Bomb album Bomb Hip Hop Compilation which has been out-of-print until now. This CD retails for the price of a regular CD. Features DJ Paul Nice, Andre the Giant from the Diggin in the Crates crew-DITC, DJ Babu from the world famous Beat Junkies, Kreators, Blackalicious, Rasco, Swollen Members, Jedi Mind Tricks, Shabazz the Disciple (produced by Lord Jamar of Brand Nubian), Steve Def (produced by King Tech from the Wake Up Show), Noggin Nodders (Motion Man with production by Kutmasta Kurt from Kool Keith/Masters of Illusion fame), E. C Illa, Supafriendz (featuring Mad Skillz), Jigmastas, Charizma & Peanut Butter Wolf, Mystik Journeymen, Madchild featuring DJ Q-Bert, Bored Stiff and many more!!!

click here for more info and the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

REBORN - Knightz of Bass

Released June 2001

Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2029

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD

Reborn is a collection of the twelve best tracks from the groups German releases Beat Wars and the self-titled album Knightz of Bass. Their first debut in the US was the track Da M-Pire that was featured on Bomb's 1999 breakdancing compilation Revenge of the B-Boy. Reminiscent of the 80's electro hip-hop sound, with 808 bass and robit-like vocoder raps listeners are taken back to the days of Cybertron (Clear), Egyptian Lover, Twighlight 22 (Electric Kingdom) and Uncle Jams Army.

click here for the Track Listing

click here to watch the Music Video for the song DA M-PIRE

___________________________________________________________

RETURN TO BURN - Def Cut

Released July 2001

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2043

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

Swiss dj Def Cut debuted in the US with Return to Burn on Bomb Hip-Hop. This monster album (CD & 2xVinyl) contains fat drum breaks, awesome vocal snippets and fresh dj scratching. Contains the European radio hits Geenie Jell and R.I.P. Marcos. Features guest appearances by Raheem and Unity Posse. Nu Skool, the latest genre of music from UK and Europe hits US shores!

click here for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

RETURN OF THE DJ - VOLUME IV - The Bomb D.J.'s

Released August 2001

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2044

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

Bomb Hip-Hop is back at it again with Volume IV of the critically acclaimed Return of the DJ series. Another all dj/all scratching album featuring some of the best turntablists in the world from the US, Canada, England and Europe. What else is there to say, these albums are awesome! Starring Qbert, Denmark's DJ Static, Moby's dj Spinbad, T-Rock and many more.

click here for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

BOMB ANNIVERSARY COLLECTION : 1991-2001 - Various

Released October 2001

4x Compact Disc set

Catalog # : BHH2045

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD

In honor of 10 years in the music business Bomb Hip-Hop has released BOMB ANNIVERSARY COLLECTION 1991-2001, a limited edition commemorative 4xCD set featuring 60 tracks including remixes and unreleased material. This CD set includes tracks from the world acclaimed Return of the DJ series, numerous DJ solo features including three time DMC champion DJ Craze, Atlanta's DJ Faust and Invisibl Skratch Piklz founding member DJ Disk. Also a cross section of home grown and international rap talent such as J-Live, Defari, Dilated Peoples, Swollen Members, Blackalicious and Paul Nice (featuring AG). The cross section of tracks feature many previously unreleased tunes, remixes and extended versions of Bomb classics, as well as bringing back some of the earliest bombs dropped on the label. The CD also contains a special Souvenir Booklet with liner notes tracing the history of the company.

click here for the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

INCREDIBLE DJ's - Skratch Comando

Released April 2002

Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2047

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD

This latest turntablist release from Bomb Hip-Hop, the label credited with the revival of the dj (the Return of the DJ series) showcases the talents of the collective known as Skratch Comando. These three DJ's - DJ Tillo, DJ Marc and DJ None from Lloret de Mar (near Barcelona, Spain) easily hold their own compared to other dj crews like The Allies, Beat Junkies, X-ecutioners and the former Invisibl Skratch Piklz. In fact, on record they actually outshine many of the albums released by US turntablists.

click here for more info and the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

REVENGE OF THE B-BOY : EPISODE 2 - Various Artists

Released May 2002

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2048

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD or Vinyl

What Bomb's Return of the DJ is to scratching Revenge of the B-Boy is to breaking, part chronicle and part manifesto. Revenge of the B-Boy : Episode 2 (attack of the toyz), the sequel to the 1999 released Revenge of the B-Boy, takes you back to the days of fat laces, Adidas warm-ups and boom boxes the size of Montana. The album features 12 newly recorded, old-school pop-locking grooves from an assortment of international producers and DJ's from Switzerland, the U.K., Australia, Canada and the US. With tracks designed to inspire the dancer in everyone Revenge 2 cracks the mold of current compilations appeasing turntablists or rap music fans, instead the songs on Revenge 2 are much more attuned to the rhythms of body movement. These custom made anthems fuse breakbeat, hip-hop, jazz, electro, turntablism and 60's soul to create an album not just to be heard, but felt.

click here for more info and Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

INSTANT RAP STAR - Bas-1 and Fanatik / with THE MASTER - Paul Nice & Stimulus

Released May 2002

Vinyl 12" single

Catalog # : BHH2049

CLICK HERE to purchase the Vinyl

INSTANT RAP STAR - Bas-1 & Fanatik (vocal and instrumental)

THE MASTER (REDUX) - Stimulus & Paul Nice (vocal and instrumental)

The 12" single Instant Rap Star by Bas-1 is taken from the full length compilation The Real Deal which tells the truth about record companies. It reveals the corrupt music industry! The creative packaging on the 12" jacket will receive more than a second glance in record stores. On the front cover are cut-out paper dolls. Anyone can build their own "Instant Rap Star", either an old skool rapper or a bling bling rapper can be dressed with cut out clothes. The back of the 12" jacket features a thought provoking article written by Wendy Day from the Rap Coalition titled "Why Rappers Aren't Millionaires".

click here for more info

___________________________________________________________

THE REAL DEAL - Various Artists

Released August 2002

Compact Disc (no longer available)

Catalog # : BHH2050

Bomb Hip-Hop Records owner David Paul is definitely the agent provocateur of the industry, and on The Real Deal he leverages his independent cred to create an compilation focused on how f*cked up the music industry is. The topic is a pretty heavy-handed one, especially for a genre whose best anthems have had to do with money, ho's, and clothes, but party rocking beats and an all-star cast of Bay Area underground stars keep the record from sounding like one long psychotherapy session.

The Real Deal puts producers and rappers on even footing, introducing pairings like cartoon-voiced MC Bas-1 with prolific Oakland beatsmith Fanatik, a raw-sounding Stimulus backed by classic funk styles from Paul Nice, and a shrill Charizma, who is almost overshadowed by his backing track, a crackling crate digger's soundscape by Peanut Butter Wolf. The sixteen trackswhich also includes some funky turntablist cut & paste numbersare broken up by interludes where artists, a sales rep, and David Paul himself grouse about various topics like payola and price gouging. The compilation is a great place to hear Bay Area indie artists in their natural habitat, but you can't help but remark the the best song on the disc, Foreign Legion's "Happy Drunk," is more about rolling out than getting sold out. - VH (Flyer magazine / Sept. 2002 issue)

click here for more info and the Track Listing

CD Liner Notes - want learn the truth about the music industry?

click here to read "The Real Deal" article by Jeriko One

___________________________________________________________

CHILLONOMETRY - Mad Doctor X

Released September 2002

Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2051

CLICK HERE to purchase via iTunes

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD

Music lovers tired of rappers will appreciate the slammin hip-hop beats, heavy bass lines and funky rhythms on this mostly instrumental 18 track CD (only 6 tracks contain vocals). "I'm doing music now that is truly close to my heart. All my influences can be heard on Chillonometry, Jazz, Soul, Funk and Dub, but all flavoured with hip-hop, the music I've grown up with and love" - MDX

click here for more info and the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

FAMILY MAN - Azeem

Released October 2002

Vinyl 12" single

Catalog # : BHH2054

CLICK HERE to purchase the Vinyl

Side A

1. FAMILY MAN - Azeem vs. Hydroponic Sound System

2. RUBBER GLUE - Azeem

Side B

1. WHAT WE DO IT LIKE (radio version) - Hydroponic Sound System vs. The Burn Unit

2. LIVE FROM THE BARBERSHOP - Hydroponic Sound System vs. The Burn Unit

The second 12" single from Bomb's full length compilation The Real Deal is a soundclash between the tight Dallas production duo of Hydroponic Sound System and some of the illist lyricists on the indie hip-hop scene today. A2 and B1 taken from the compilation album The Real Deal.

click here for more info

___________________________________________________________

click here for more info and the Track Listing

___________________________________________________________

The Best of RETURN OF THE DJ - The Bomb D.J.'s

Released March 2003

Compact Disc (no longer available)

Bomb celebrates its 50th release with this special limited edition CD. The Best of RETURN OF THE DJ features the cream of the crop from the four volumes - Qbert (Wave Twisters), Rob Swift of the X-Ecutioners, Mixmaster Mike of Beastie Boys, Mr. Dibbs of Atmosphere, Kid Koala (Ninja Tune) and many more world famous deejays. CREATE & HUSTLE - Bavu Blakes

Released May 2003

Compact Disc

Catalog # : BHH2058

CLICK HERE to purchase the CD

Bavu Blakes, dubbed "One of Texas' brightest new stars" by legendary rapper The D.O.C., is the ultimate wordsmith. Bavu Blakes originally released Create & Hustle independently and sold 2,000 units on his own at live shows and record stores in Texas. Now Create & Hustle has been released nationally as a joint venture between Blakes' Word4Word Music and Bomb Hip-Hop Records, distributed by Caroline (home to strong independent hip-hop labels like Battle Axe, Ninja Tune, Def Jux and Stones Throw). Includes production by NickNack and Hydroponic Sound System. Features dj cuts by DJ Logic and Baby G.

RETURN OF THE DJ - Volume V - The Bomb D.J.'s

Released October 2003

Double Vinyl and Compact Disc (no longer available)

Catalog # : BHH2060

Bomb Hip-Hop helped spark the turntablist revolution in 1995 with the release of the first ever all dj/all scratching album RETURN OF THE DJ. Now scratching & dj'ing has gone mainstream, infiltrating rock & pop music and providing soundtracks for everything from movies to television commercials to video games. This fifth installment in the pioneering series features the newest & best turntablists assembled from the USA, Canada, the UK, Italy, Germany and Japan.
